sec.p: The essential oil was obtained from the aerial parts, by steam distillation in a Clevenger-type apparatus for 4 h. Four distillations were carried out with 1805, 751, 794, and 758 grams of fresh plant material, respectively. The oil was dried on anhydrous sodium sulfate and then stored at −14 °C. The yield was expressed as mean values and standard deviations of the four distillations and reported as percentages of w/ w.
